parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Ropes and Sling Loading

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if [[setSlingLoad]] is possible.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>heli [[canSlingLoad]] cargo

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> heli: [[Object]] - a helicopter

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> cargo: [[Object]] - an entity

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if [[setSlingLoad]] is possible

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_canSling = veh1 [[canSlingLoad]] veh2;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] (([[vehicle]] [[player]]) [[canSlingLoad]] veh1);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ropes]], [[enableRopeAttach]], [[getSlingLoad]], [[ropeAttachedObjects]], [[ropeAttachTo]], [[ropeDestroy]], [[ropeLength]], [[ropeUnwound]], [[ropeAttachedTo]], [[ropeCreate]], [[ropeDetach]], [[ropeAttachEnabled]], [[ropeCut]], [[ropeEndPosition]], [[ropeUnwind]], [[setSlingLoad]], [[slingLoadAssistantShown]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
